Package com.castawaysoftware.propertymanager.controllers

Class PropertyController

java.lang.Object
com.castawaysoftware.propertymanager.controllers.PropertyController
@RestController public class PropertyController extends Object

Property Controller

Is the end point for all things related to CRUD of Properties

Request: "/property/" or "/property/{id}" (If request is for a specific Property)

Current supported

Get

  • Method Details

    • getAllProperties

      @GetMapping("/property/") public List<Property> getAllProperties()
      GetMapping all properties Uses PropertyRepository to get all Properties in database
      Returns:
      List

    • getPropertyById

      @GetMapping("/property/{id}") Property getPropertyById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Uses PropertyRepository to get a single Property from database by Id.
      Returns:
      List

    • addProperty

      @PostMapping("/property/") Property addProperty(@RequestBody Property newProperty)
      Add Property Client sends newProperty without an id, the program checks for other properties using PropertyRepository existsByName with the same name. If there are no properties with the same name, it uses PropertyRepository to save newProperty\ After save, it sends back the created Property
      Parameters:
      newProperty -
      Returns:
      Property
